attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
That the Prime Minister, and his cabinet, consider installing the wage related pension scheme, based on earnings today, based on national average.
So therefor egiving the pensioner a better deal, and put him/her on par with european neighborours

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
